plugin.name: Alien
plugin.title: Alien BBC
plugin.desc: AlienBBC allows you to listen to BBC Radio streams via Squeezecenter. It also adds the ability to listen to many other radio streams using Real Audio via Squeezecenter. Alien required the use of mplayer to decode real audio streams. For windows machines this will be automatically downloaded, for mac and windows machines please install mplayer separately.
plugin.creator: AlienBBC Team
